name: Misty Short
text: Took forever, and I get back to work and this is what it looks like! All the greasy toppings in the corner of the box!!

name: J B
text: Little Caesar's as a company gets 5 stars, because you can't beat cheap decent pizza that's ready for pick up. As for this location though, it would get 0 stars if I could give it that. I've never felt like I inconvenienced some one so much ‚Ä¶More

name: Trent Willhite
text: Amazing and delicious. Fast and easy. If you need to get in and out you can. It's a great place to eat on a cold day and on a warm day. Its family friendly and the employees are great. The food was delicious. They have sweet and savory ‚Ä¶More

name: Gin S
text: Quick, fast and ready. Sadly, we went yesterday and the store is closed up for good. No notice!

text: I was here this evening to pick up my family a pizza and while waiting i noticed NO gloves are being worn when making your pizzas at this location. To me this is A major health risk/hazard and failure in management and training.  The people ‚Ä¶More

name: Tommy Hunter
text: The new thing crust pizza was served quickly, hot and it was DELICIOUS! Top marks and highly recommended. Best pizza value out there. üëç

name: Silent Rain
text: Usually everything is fine but this time none of the cheesy breads crust was done, it was soggy. One of the workers was very friendly and one was not too enthusiastic, I know we all have bad days but if you don't like the job maybe he should find something more suitable.

name: sandra reis
text: We usually get an "extra most bestest" pepperoni and it's always delicious! And inexpensive too!  Hand made crust is soooooo good!

name: Dean McKenzie
text: What can I say, it's Little Caesars. Cheap pizza, expected service. They have deals sometimes. Though I think they might have a different understanding of their catch phrase, 'Hot-n-Ready', than I do, cause very rarely are they things they ‚Ä¶More

name: Ron L
text: Every time I come here the pizza is always fresh because they never have anything ready.. No complaints really, just always be prepared to wait because there isn't anything hot and ready as advertised... This location is also about the only one in town that does not offer online ordering and the new self pickup kiosks..

name: Timothy VanDuyne
text: Great place! Two men were great and quick! Couldn‚Äôt be more happier.

name: Danny Leach
text: This pizza is so good! Service great, friendly! 8 min wait time, around 11 am.

name: M C
text: Really good pizza at a dirt cheap price. Best part the general manager keeps the customer service alive! She was the only one in the store and had to take orders/answer phones/cook! your order/cash you out. Even with all that she still had a smile!

text: Store is very dirty!! Service is good. I personally wont eat their pizza but my son loves it

text: Love it when they hang up on me with out telling me how much my order costs or how long it will take. Same woman has done it to me twice now. Totally unacceptable!

name: Dietrich Braun
text: You get what you pay for. $5 pizza is an amazing value even one sauce cup is 50 cents, so if you like to dip your pizza in ranch then just use a bottle from home. I was given fast service even right before closing time when the employees looked completely done for the day.

name: Khris L
text: Very helpful

name: Erin Elizabeth Berling
text: Just has a counter with no seating and service is usually very quick. Limited number of selections like other locations.  Their 4 piece pick 2 types of pizza is a good deal & tastes good. The crazy bread is also a good price & they are very good as well.

name: Regina Williams
text: Nothing was hot or ready...they may want to rethink that tag line. 5:00 pm on a Sunday and at least 25 people came in while I was waiting for my pizza. Several just left. Got home and opened my pizza box to find a burnt pizza that smelled weird. We gave up and ate PB&J for dinner

name: Honest Man
text: Good and bad experiences here. Just from now on order the food ahead of time over the phone before entering or u may get a pizza thats been sitting under heat shoot for to long. Or breadsticks thats are nasty from being in the box for to ‚Ä¶More
